channel.title: Milestone v0.8
channel.description:
**Tag :** [v0.8](https://forum.mesg.com/tags/v0-8) **Due date:** 25 January 2019 **GitHub:** https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/milestone/7
# Main features
- [\*] @krhubert https://forum.mesg.com/t/support-deployments-from-tarball-urls/59 - [\*] @Nicolas https://forum.mesg.com/t/go-libraries/191
# Bugs
- [\*] @krhubert [interface/grpc/core: ListenTask gets canceled](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/549) - [\*] @krhubert Implement same fix of ListenTask from ListenEvent and ListenResult in CLI commands. - [ ] @krhubert [add omitempty flag to generate same hash even if struct change](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/718) / https://forum.mesg.com/t/replace-structhash-with-json-encoding/216 - [ ] https://forum.mesg.com/t/services-hash-are-different-from-downloaded-tarball-and-remote-git/211
# Test
- [ ] [Improve test for deploy](https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/issues/723)

item.title: Milestone v0.8
item.dc:creator: Nicolas
item.description:
Tag : v0.8
Due date: 25 January 2019
GitHub: https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/milestone/7

Main features

  • @krhubert Support deployments from tarball urls
  • @Nicolas Go libraries

Bugs

  • @krhubert interface/grpc/core: ListenTask gets canceled
  • @krhubert Implement same fix of ListenTask from ListenEvent and ListenResult in CLI commands.
  • @krhubert add omitempty flag to generate same hash even if struct change / Replace structhash with json encoding
  • Service's hash are different from downloaded tarball and remote git

Test

  • Improve test for deploy

Read full topic
